name: wp-update-version
description: Command-line tool that updates the version number in various files within a WordPress project (plugin or theme).
author: Sam Lemaresquier <contact@samlem.com> (samlem.com)

scripts.dev: tsx lib --package-json example/package.json --file example/plugin-name.php --file example/style.css --file example/theme-style.scss --file example/theme-style.sass --constant PLUGIN_NAME_VERSION
